name: Fault Break Ep. 1
description:
The first episode of a series of short story-based action games about a world that has been broken into many pieces.

This episode follows Davey, a small time degenerate and botanist, as he fights his way through monsters to find his missing partner-in-crime.

Suggestions/Feedback/Bug reports always appreciated!

New episodes of Fault Break should come out in between my other projects. That being said, I'm hoping to get new episodes out semi-frequently.

I hope you enjoy!

Controls:
- WASD to move/jump
- Mouse to aim
- Left mouse button to attack
- Right mouse button to inspect
- Space to enter doors and advance dialogue
